comments: SLAYC GIRLS ITS GOING DOWN

This comeback perfectly repackages their bubblegum pop aesthetic to look more fresh and Japanese market -friendly! The choreography is live vocal friendly and the background track is so danceable  Plus the use of POPPY as a pun for puppy love is so cute
essa música é tão viciante, amei! acho que foi o primeiro single japonês da 4 geração que eu gostei kkk
i’ve seen people hating on the chorus, but the girls that get it get it. this whole song is a bop & stayc doesn’t disappoint as always!

Deep inside I wished this was a Korean release it's so G♡♡D and so refreshing I love the sound and STAYC makes it a 100 times better with their beautiful voices, their visuals an their performance. The choreo is just so cute and fun I love love love it I hope we get a performance version! ♡

Esse MV me trouxe lembranças do Kpop de alguns grupos de 2 geração, misturada com a 4 obviamente, essa câmera bem focada nos rostos com esses figurinos e locações super coloridos. E música com estética única, STAYC não erra nunca.
Yet again STAYC makes an AMAZING song. Not just "good", not just "nice", phenomenal. They DO NOT FAIL! STAYC JJANG!!!!
Even in Japanese tracks, STAYC never disappoints
